welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bade, Taiwan! Known for its breathtaking natural landscapes and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and create unforgettable memories."

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Taipei Songshan Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: This network is free to use, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.
